descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Quick and simple conversion. I just thought Laxi2601\'s daedric mod was too awesome to not use, even though I use light armor. I\'m sure many of you will agree.

There are two different versions. One just changes the current Heavy Daedric Armor to Light armor. The other one allows you to craft a separate set of Light Daedric armor at the Blacksmith. Should be upgradable and enchantable, with same recipe as the standard armor. I adjusted the weight and armor values of the Light set to match Dragonplate Armor. All Light armor perks should work without problem.

Since this is just an esp file that takes on whatever textures you use, it is compatible with all armor mods and body types, whether it be CBBE or UNP etc.

I also added an \"invisible helmet\" version of each armor. Personally, I prefer it that way, and just leaving the option available. The helmet will equip and u still get the full set bonus, it just doesn\'t show up. This mod should also be compatible with the Open Face Helmets mod, if that is your preference.

INSTALLATION
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Straightforward esp file. Just place in Data folder or install via NMM.

NOTES
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This is my first mod, and I would appreciate any comments and critiques. Thanks, and enjoy!
author: d4ynee
